resource.title: "Take Me Home" Taxi Card
resource.description: Digital and printable cards with your property address in local script, landmark anchors, and pronunciation guides for guests navigating with local drivers.
resource.painPoint: Taxi/Tuk-tuk drivers often cannot read English maps or Latin script addresses, leaving guests stranded or overcharged.
keyFeatures: Local Script Address: Large, clear address in Hindi/Thai/Vietnamese
Landmark Anchors: "Near [Famous Temple/Mall]" context for drivers
Phonetics: "How to say it" guide for the guest (e.g., "Leow Sai" for Turn Left)

specifics: Thai script address with tones marked
